testcase.name: user will be able to join our team

failure.message: Expected condition failed: waiting for element found by By.xpath: //body/section[@id='navbar-scroll']/div[1]/div[2]/div[1]/ul[1]/li[5]/a[1] to be selected (tried for 10 second(s) with 500 milliseconds interval)
